item.title: CVE-2024-7608|2024-08-28T11:45:52.314Z -- trellix -- trellix%20nx%2C%20ex%2C%20ax%2C%20fx%2C%20cms%20and%20ivx
item.description: An authenticated user can access the restricted files from NX, EX, FX, AX, IVX and CMS using path traversal.
